channel.title: 阿基诺三世 on 品葱*精选

item.title: 菲律宾前总统阿基诺三世病逝 终年61岁 任内坚定反中外交 发起南海仲裁挑战中国
item.description: MANILA, Philippines — Former President Benigno Simeon “Noynoy” Aquino III has passed away, former Malacañang officials said Thursday morning. He was 61. Aquino died at 4:30 a.m. on Thursday at the Capitol Medical Center …
